projects.title: Badgario - A ðŸ’© version of Agar.io
projects.description: This project is the closest I have come to making a finished, playable game. I made it as a side project during my first work term (Fall 2017) as a way to learn the basics of game development. It plays exactly like Agar.io, the difference being that it is single player, and in order to win, you have to defeat a final boss.

projects.title: Vector Playground - Visualize vectors in 3d space!
projects.description: My grade 12 computer science final project. I, along with 3 other classmates (We called ourselves MagV Studios, haha), created an application using the Unity 3d Game Engine to visualize vectors in a 3 dimensional environment. We needed to cater our app to a specific client and his needs, which in this case, was our grade 12 Calculus teacher, Mr. Hyde.
